<!-- 办公用品领用申请sql和hql -->
<sql-query name="oa_searchOaProductAppList">
<![CDATA[
		select app.*,s_users.login_name 
		from oa_product_app  app ,s_users  
		where s_users.user_id=app.create_by
		and app.create_by=?
		and status=?
		#[and app.create_date>=?]
		#[and app.create_date<=?]

	]]>
</sql-query>

采用#[]作为判断机制，sql简洁实用，简化开发过程！
